Awards

Exothermic Robotics

Awards

Group Photo!

Disclaimer: These are not all of our awards as every senior at Exothermic Robotics gets to take home one award before they graduate. What we have right now is only around half of our actual number of awards.

Tower Takeover 2019 - 2020
Turning Point 2018 - 2019
In the Zone 2017 - 2018
Starstruck 2016 - 2017
Nothing But Net 2015 - 2016
Skyrise 2014 - 2015
Toss Up 2013 - 2014
Sack Attack 2012 - 2013
Gateway 2011 - 2012

Hangin' Around 2006 - 2007
